params.value: The amount of destination currency tokens they received after the exchange.
The amount of tokens you intend to send.

appendAccountIssuanceRecord(address,uint.details: onlySynthetix to call me on synthetix.issue() & synthetix.burn() calls to store the locked SNX per fee period so we know to allocate the correct proportions of fees and rewards per period

params.debtEntryIndex: The index in the global debt ledger. synthetix.synthetixState().issuanceData(account)
params.debtRatio: Debt percentage this account has locked after minting or burning their synth

params.currencyKey: Synth currency you wish to receive the fees in.

params.account: The address you want to query the penalty for

params.value: The value you want the recipient to receive

feesAvailable(address,bytes4).details: Returns two amounts, one for fees and one for SNX rewards

params.currencyKey: The currency you want to price the fees in

params.account: The address you want to query the fees by penalty for

params._claimingAddress: account to check the last fee period ID claim for

getLastFeeWithdrawal(address).return: uint of the feePeriodID this account last claimed

initiateSelfDestruct().details: Only the contract owner may call this.

nominateNewOwner(address).details: Only the current owner may nominate a new owner.

selfDestruct().details: Only the contract owner may call this.

setExchangeFeeRate(uint256).details: The fee rate is in decimal format, with UNIT being the value of 100%.

setSelfDestructBeneficiary(address).details: Only the contract owner may call this. The provided beneficiary must be non-null.

params._beneficiary: The address to pay any eth contained in this contract to upon self-destruction.

setTransferFeeRate(uint256).details: The fee rate is in decimal format, with UNIT being the value of 100%.

terminateSelfDestruct().details: Only the contract owner may call this.

params.currencyKey: The currency you want to price the fees in

params.value: The value you want the recipient to receive

acceptOwnership().notice: Accept the nomination to be owner.

amountReceivedFromExchange(uint256).notice: The amount the recipient will receive if you are performing an exchange and the destination currency will be worth a certain number of tokens.

amountReceivedFromTransfer(uint256).notice: The amount the recipient will receive if you send a certain number of tokens.

appendAccountIssuanceRecord(address,uint.notice: Logs an accounts issuance data per fee period

claimFees(bytes4).notice: Claim fees for last period when available or not already withdrawn.

closeCurrentFeePeriod().notice: Close the current fee period and start a new one. Only callable by the fee authority.

currentPenalty(address).notice: The penalty a particular address would incur if its fees were withdrawn right now

exchangeFeeIncurred(uint256).notice: Calculate the fee charged on top of a value being sent via an exchange

exchangedAmountToReceive(uint256).notice: The value that you would need to get after currency exchange so that the recipient receives a specified value.

feePaid(bytes4,uint256).notice: The Synthetix contract informs us when fees are paid.

feesAvailable(address,bytes4).notice: The fees available to be withdrawn by a specific account, priced in currencyKey currency

feesByPeriod(address).notice: Calculates fees by period for an account, priced in XDRs

getLastFeeWithdrawal(address).notice: Get the feePeriodID of the last claim this account made

initiateSelfDestruct().notice: Begin the self-destruction counter of this contract. Once the delay has elapsed, the contract may be self-destructed.

nominateNewOwner(address).notice: Nominate a new owner of this contract.

rewardsMinted(uint256).notice: The Synthetix contract informs us when SNX Rewards are minted to RewardEscrow to be claimed.

selfDestruct().notice: If the self-destruction delay has elapsed, destroy this contract and remit any ether it owns to the beneficiary address.

setDelegateApprovals(address).notice: Set the address of the contract for delegate approvals

setExchangeFeeRate(uint256).notice: Set the exchange fee, anywhere within the range 0-10%.

setFeeAuthority(address).notice: Set the address of the user/contract responsible for collecting or distributing fees.

setFeePoolState(address).notice: Set the address of the contract for feePool state

setSelfDestructBeneficiary(address).notice: Set the beneficiary address of this contract.

setTransferFeeRate(uint256).notice: Set the transfer fee, anywhere within the range 0-10%.

terminateSelfDestruct().notice: Terminate and reset the self-destruction timer.

totalFeesAvailable(bytes4).notice: The total fees available in the system to be withdrawn, priced in currencyKey currency

totalRewardsAvailable().notice: The total SNX rewards available in the system to be withdrawn

transferFeeIncurred(uint256).notice: Calculate the Fee charged on top of a value being sent

transferredAmountToReceive(uint256).notice: The value that you would need to send so that the recipient receives a specified value.
